def FetchRecord(dbname,table, condition=''):
    db = sqlite3.connect(dbname)  
    cu=db.cursor()
    if condition!='':
        condition="where %s"%condition    cu=db.cursor()
    cu.execute('''delete from %s where %s'''%(table,condition))
    db.commit()
    cu.close()
    db.close()   
def FetchRecord(dbname,table, condition=''):
    db = sqlite3.connect(dbname)  
    cu=db.cursor()
    if condition!='':
        condition="where %s"%condition
    records =cu.execute('''select * from %s %s'''%(table,condition))
    result =[]    
    for i in records:
        i= list(i)
        result.append(i)
     
    db.commit()
    cu.close()
    db.close()   
    return result
